text:
When selecting multiple Simple Controllers, ThreadGroups, SOAP/XML-RPC 
Requests, etc they can not be activated or deactivated at once. 
Only one of the selected is activated or deactivated.
creator: r.vanderboom@kpn-is.nl

text:
Would be a useful enhancement - again, I think there might already be an
outstanding enhancment request for this.
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
